title: BRIEF-Firm Capital American Buys 50% Interest In 138-Unit, Multi Residential Building For $20.3 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Firm Capital American Buys 50% Interest In 138-Unit, Multi Residential Building For $20.3 Mln

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 16, 2019 18:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Firm Capital American Buys 50% Interest In 138-Unit, Multi Residential Building For $20.3 Mln Sept 16 (Reuters) - Firm Capital American Realty Partners Corp FCA.V : * FIRM CAPITAL AMERICAN REALTY PARTNERS CORP. ANNOUNCES THE PURCHASE OF A 50% INTEREST IN A 138-UNIT, MULTI RESIDENTIAL BUILDING FOR $20.3 MILLION IN THE GREATER ATLANTA AREA * FIRM CAPITAL AMERICAN REALTY PARTNERS CORP - PROPERTY IS EXPECTED TO BE FINANCED, IN PART, BY A NEW FIRST MORTGAGE FOR APPROXIMATELY $14.0 MILLION

BRIEF-Firm Capital American Buys 50% Interest In 138-Unit, Multi Residential Building For $20.3 Mln
description: BRIEF-Firm Capital American Buys 50% Interest In 138-Unit, Multi Residential Building For $20.3 Mln
